tool.name: qiime2 phylogeny filter-tree
tool.description: Remove features from tree based on metadata

param.name: table
param.label: table: FeatureTable[Frequency | RelativeFrequency | PresenceAbsence | Composition]
param.help: [optional] Feature table which contains the identifier that should be retained in the tree

repeat.name: metadata
repeat.help: [optional] Feature metadata to use with the 'where' statement or to select tips to be retained. Metadata objects could also include FeatureData[Sequence] data types, if, forinstance, you want to filter to match represenative sequencces.
repeat.title: metadata: Metadata

conditional.name: __q2galaxy__GUI__conditional__where__
conditional.label: where: Str
conditional.help: [optional] SQLite WHERE clause specifying sample metadata criteria that must be met to be included in the filtered feature table. If not provided, all samples in `metadata` that are also in the feature table will be retained.

param.name: __q2galaxy__GUI__select__
param.label: where: Str
param.help: [optional] SQLite WHERE clause specifying sample metadata criteria that must be met to be included in the filtered feature table. If not provided, all samples in `metadata` that are also in the feature table will be retained.

tool.help:
QIIME 2: phylogeny filter-tree ============================== Remove features from tree based on metadata
Outputs: -------- :filtered_tree.qza: The resulting phylogenetic tree.
|
Description: ------------ Remove tips from a tree if their identifiers based on a set of provided identifiers.
|
